mapper.insert: insert into member(mem_Id , mem_Password , mem_Email , mem_Nickname , mem_Img , role) values(#{memId} , #{memPassword}, #{memEmail}, #{memNickname}, #{memImg}, #{role})
mapper.update: update member set mem_Password = #{newMemPassword} , mem_Nickname = #{memNickname} , mem_Email = #{memEmail} where memId=#{memId}
update member set mem_Nickname = #{memNickname} , mem_Email = #{memEmail} where mem_Id=#{memId}
update member set mem_Img=#{memImg} where mem_Id=#{memId}
